# ðŸ“Š Data Directory

This directory contains character data files and session tracking information.

## Files Stored Here

- `kazrek_epic_data.json` - Current character data (auto-generated)
- `session_data_*.json` - Session-specific saves
- Character backup files

## Auto-Generated Files

These files are created automatically by the update scripts:
- Character stats and progression
- Equipment and currency tracking  
- Spell and ability data
- Session history

## Note

Data files are gitignored for privacy but this directory structure is preserved.
